relman_ctl

usage should be like:
  relman_ctl generate [installer|builder|manager] [name]

this should create a local directory of [name]:

for installer:
[name]
  conf/
    target/
      [prod|dev|qa]/
      [test]/
        named_target_template.xml
        install_behavior_template.xml
    installer/
      release_installer_template.xml
  plugins/
    auth/
  serve.py
  README.txt

for builder:
[name]
  conf/
    builder/
      build_host_template.xml
      release_builder_template.xml
  plugins/
    auth/
  serve.py
  README.txt

for manager:
[name]
  conf/
    project/
      project_definition_template.xml
    manager/
      release_manager_template.xml
  plugins/
  serve.py
  README.txt
